2023-08-15-2023-08-16.block:
Blockchain Futurist Conference is returning for its 5th year on August 15 & 16, 2023 in Toronto, Canada at Rebel Entertainment Complex and Cabana. The conference focuses on exploring the future potential and direction of blockchain technology by bringing together the greatest minds of Web3, crypto, metaverse, DeFi, GameFi, NFTs, DAOs, and more. It is designed as a fully immersive crypto experience with crypto powered marketplaces, NFT Galleries, Crypto ATMs, and blockchain technology used throughout the event. ... 2023-08-24-2023-08-25.block:
Coinfest Asia, the immersive Web3 festival in Asia, will be back on 24-25 August 2023 in Bali. Previously, the 2022 edition of Coinfest Asia managed to have more than 2,000 participants from more than 50 countries, these participants started from the institutional level, retail, and regulators.

2023-08-29-2023-08-30.block:
